body:
seen under `msan` build on 1.4.x branch:

I0612 18:27:37.813602972   30787 http_connect_handshaker.c:319] Connecting to server localhost:20900 via HTTP proxy ipv6:[::1]:9972
D0612 18:27:37.814355347   30861 http_proxy_fixture.c:331]   on_read_request_done: 0x74400001c800 "No Error"
D0612 18:27:37.925942064   30787 chttp2_transport.c:1576]    PING strike
